'''1.19.50.0''' is the first beta version of [[Minecraft Education 1.19.52]], released on December 1, 2022,<ref>{{cite|url=https://web.archive.org/web/20221201011627/https://educommunity.minecraft.net/hc/en-us/articles/10939858344340-What-s-New-in-The-Wild-Update-Beta-v1-19-|title=What's New in The Wild Update Beta (v1.19)|website=Minecraft: Education Edition Support}}</ref> which based on [[Bedrock Edition 1.19.50]], introduces features from [[The Wild Update]].

== Additions ==
{{main|Bedrock Edition 1.19.0|Bedrock Edition 1.19.10|Bedrock Edition 1.19.20|Bedrock Edition 1.19.30|Bedrock Edition 1.19.40|Bedrock Edition 1.19.50}}
* Added features from [[The Wild Update]].

=== General ===
; Library
* Added computer science folders.

== Changes ==
=== General ===
; Library
* Improved Search featuring tag search, better non-English searching, and more.

; OS minimum requirement
* Changed OS minimum requirement, as following:
** macOS Big Sur (11.0)
** Windows 8.1
** iOS 11

; Sign-In Experience
* Switching from Azure Active Directory Authentication Library (ADAL) to Microsoft Authentication Library (MSAL) for Microsoft authentication.

; User Experience
* Easier to use tooltips and control hints in-world.
</onlyinclude>
